ComicInfo.Title: Plan B
ComicInfo.Summary:
After devastating losses, humanity's last hope for salvation is down to Ash, Eva, Dracula, and a group of kung-fu monks. But can Ash keep his head after helping the Frankenstein Monster pull himself together?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 2 | C/RE | Walker Stalker Exclusive Homage Variant Cover | Ken Haeser | 3 | D/RE | Walker Stalker Exclusive Homage "Black & White" Variant Cover | Ken Haeser | 4 | E/RE | Walker Stalker Exclusive Variant Cover | Ben Templesmith | 5 | F/RE | Walker Stalker Exclusive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Ben Templesmith | 6 | G/RE | Walker Stalker/Plastic Empire Exclusive Variant Cover | None | 7 | *Notes:* The Walker Stalker Exclusive Homage Variant Cover and Homage "Black & White" Variant Cover are a homage of the cover of The Walking Dead #1.
